title: Street kids
creator_credit: Dmitry Schukin, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: From Russia to Werribee, via the gangs of Los Angeles and Las Vegas, Dmitry Schukin’s story is one of redemption through art. He talks openly about the crimes of his past and the pursuits that have helped him channel all the negative into something positive and given Schukin something to fight for.
